subscription-body.standard1: It is necessary to answer at least 2 questions before entering the instant chat.
subscription-body.advenced1: Photos can be set to be displayed without opening the chat screen.
subscription-body.advenced3: Skip the questions, let's go to the chat, send a request.
subscription-body.advenced4: You can switch to invisible mode.
subscription-body.extAdvenced3: Photo sharing option is activated on the chat screen.
